title: symmetric and asymmetric encryptiondecryption
extract: Asymmetrical Encryption. Asymmetrical encryption is also known as public key cryptography, which is a relatively new method, compared to symmetric encryption. Asymmetric encryption uses two keys to encrypt a plain text. ... The second private key is kept a secret so that you can only know.Dec 31, 2015
extract_html: Asymmetrical Encryption. Asymmetrical encryption is also known as public key cryptography, which is a relatively new method, compared to symmetric encryption. Asymmetric encryption uses two keys to encrypt a plain text. ... The second private key is kept a secret so that you can only know.Dec 31, 2015
